name: Low-Volume Momentum Surge Crypto Strategy
description: A daily-timeframe momentum strategy for mid-cap altcoins. It goes long when volume contracts by ≥30 % below its 20-day average while RSI(14) crosses above 60 and price closes above EMA(10). Exits on RSI ≥85 or a daily close below EMA(10). Risk is managed with 3 % capital allocation per trade, a hard 5 % stop, and a 10 % trailing profit capture.
